name: Shooting Stars Catch
description:
Entry for the WGJ 135, theme: Shooting Star

[not complete at ALL. I'm goint to update this as soon as possible!]

Hooray! Shooting stars night! It's time for your wishes to come true!

Tonight's your chance, in order to assure at least one of your wishes granted, try to see and catch ALL the shooting stars you can before the dawn. Will you manage to catch them all?

HOW TO PLAY: point your mouse and click on the shooting stars you see! Try to catch them all before the time limit
